text: hi it's Chetan MA and I'm going to tell
you a pretty interesting story it
happened to me when I first came to
Korea so I came to Korea in 2010 April
and I was fresh from foreign lands you
can say and I started my language course
at Kyung hee University language course
is where we learned Korean language so
usually in that school they they give us
Hangul go do me
that is our Korean language helpers and
they are supposed to help us in
developing our Korean speaking skills
and in exchange for that we sometimes
teach them our language English or they
get paid for it now in my case I got
mail dumi he was 29 I'm 19 so he's 10
years older than me that wasn't a
problem but the way he looked he was
pale like white like if you stood in the
sunlight you would be like you'd be like
that he was really bright and he had
really red lips and really black eyes so
I was kind of well it was strange for me
I wasn't I didn't hate or anything no
just a bit strange for me and he
couldn't speak that much English he
couldn't so he was also like this height
I suppose yeah it was this height and he
always wore a cap always he never took
off his cap never and it wasn't a
different cap it was the same cap so
already I kind of feel ok this guy is a
bit strange ok so one day we were
walking like a normal day walking down
the street and just
we're shining rides and everything was
going fine until he decided to try to
speak English now he wanted to say a
correct word like we should keep in
touch but he ended up saying we should
keep touching and I was like what he was
like
we should keep touching and I was like
Pyong Te'o you know one touch of here I
was like keep touching are you and then
he saw my face I was like shocked and he
was like ah no no no no no I was like
keep in touch
he's like yes yes keep in touch I was
like huh
you're sure you meant to say keep in
touch you didn't mean you're like no no
no I was like okay we should keep in
touch then so what is the moral of the

strangers foreigner keep touching no

keep touching keep in touch two
